content: blue color a white cast on 32 stitches leaving a 3-4 tail row 1 rs knit row row 2 knit row cut yarn leaving a 3-4 tail tie a knot as in tip 3 above row 3 & 4 --color b turquoise repeat row 1 and 2 row 5 & 6 --color a repeat row 1 and 2 row 7 thru 12 --color c dark blue repeat row 1 and 2 for 6 row repeat above 12 row for a total of 60 row copyright © 2025 carol trouba all rights reserved all the ends email fancystepsknits@gmail com 3 color a last row rs knit row you ll need 72-75 of yarn bind off cut yarn and tie last knot no ends to weave in cid 45492 cid 45490 cid 45493 cid 45494 cid 45495 cid 45491 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 cid 57355 finishing trim all fringe to ¾ from the knot or desired length fringe will shrink a bit in wash thank you from fancy steps knits cid 57355 enjoy your knitting in process copyright © 2025 carol trouba all rights reserved all the ends email fancystepsknits@gmail com
